titleStmt.title: A dialogue betwixt Lewis and the devil in the last year of his puissance: with his last will and testament

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by John Wallis, near the Green Dragon Tavern in Fleet-street,

notesStmt.note: Date of publication from Wing (CD-ROM edition).
In verse: "What shrill and eccho'd groans possess my soul?"
Lewis = Louis XIV, King of France.
Reproduction of original in the Newberry Library.

place.placeName: the Green Dragon Tavern in Fleet-street
